snippet.title: Cosmic Panic Release Trailer- NOW AVAILABLE ON STEAM!
snippet.description:
Cosmic PANIC is a new arcade style party game with a variety of modes and mini-games to play with your friends or to play solo and push for a new high score! From SumoShellBombFunk, a small group of indie game developers looking to publish our first full game!

Music is performed by Carl Kasey   @WhiteBatAudio  

Now available on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2592940/Cosmic_PANIC/

Follow the game at cosmicpanic.space
twitter.com/SSBFgames
instagram.com/ssbfgames

#indiegame #indiegamedev #gamedev
